dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: Stratum Type
dataModel.author: J. Harris
dataModel.description: This table specifies the cover scale recognized by the plot data collectors.

entity.entitySummary: This table links the cover scale recognized by the plot data collectors to a cover scale specified in the coverIndicies table.

attribute.attDefinition: Primary Key for the coverMethod table.
Cover scale type (examples may include: Braun-Blanquet scale, the Barkman et al., Franklin et al., Pfister-Arnold etc..
